title: Install Capycanna app!
description: You now have full access to our app, with a constantly growing library of bestsellers and top global ideas.
terms: By continuing, you confirm that you've read and agree to our <term>Terms & Conditions</term>, <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> and <subscription>Subscription Policy</subscription>

manual.automaticallyText: Click the button below to download, and log in with your username and password.
manual.manuallyText: Your login and password have been sent to your inbox. If it's not there, please check your Spam folder.
manual.text: Download the Capycanna app and log in with the username and password sent to your email.
